channel.title: Code Editor :: She Codes One Day Workshop Tutorials (new)
channel.description: VS Code VS Code is a very popular and free to use editor. Itâ€™s available for Windows, OS X and Linux. Note, if you are using a Chromebook then it will present you with a few options to download from, choose the option that has the .deb or debian and that should work for you. Download it here Why are we installing a code editor? You might be wondering why we are installing this special code editor software, rather than using something like Word or Notepad.
